message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the details with you. As we begin our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $800000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your product and would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $820000 for the product.
I've reviewed Alice's latest offer and would like to propose a counteroffer of $765000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $765000. After reconsidering, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $790000 for the product.
After evaluating the situation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $775000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $775000. After reconsidering, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $795000 for the product.
Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $780000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $780000. After reconsidering, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $800000 for the product.
After reviewing the offers, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $785000.
